pages.text: The $(5)Soul Anchor$() is a permanent tether to the mortal realm. Once placed in the world, your soul is $(n)locked$() to its location.
As long as the anchor stands, you are $(6)immortal$(). Should your body perish, the anchor will instantly pull your essence back to its position, effectively $(5)respawning$() you on the spot.

But beware: the bond is $(4)painfully deep$(). If the anchor itself is attacked, you will feel $(n)Phantom Pains$()â€”suffering damage as if your own flesh were being struck. Protect your anchor as you would your own heart.
